title: kotajikikox
author: kotajikikox
content: Have anyone already watched John Wick 4? is there any comments about comparison from 1,2,3 part?I am a big fan of Keanu and watched the first 4, but seeing the trailer of this last part seems to me is exaggerated , thanks for sharing guys .

comments.author: swiftxi
comments.body: Ohh wow John Wick. Seen the first 3 parts also, what a mess of hard to believe gunshots. Ill prob end up watching thr 4th aswell... No big expectations

comments.author: henrytheeight
comments.body: If you are a fan of action movies or the previous John Wick films, then you may find John Wick 4 interesting. However, whether or not you will enjoy the movie ultimately depends on your personal preferences and tastes.

comments.author: Dhrugtest
comments.body: Can't just wait for the download to my mobile phone

comments.author: Lancer_01
comments.body: I really liked the movie, Keanu Reeves, just great acting, picture and sound, also on high.

comments.author: Albert_09
comments.body: I liked all the parts, but 3 is the best.

comments.author: devil-soul
comments.body: I agree 3 was the best 4 should be seen without high expectations

comments.author: Nicestake
comments.body: Awaiting for it to be get downloaded on my phone ðŸ˜˜

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Going longer? From part 1 to this part 4 ,it becomes exaggerating and not so human acting But since this is Keanu and i know the quality of the actor?Just watch without over expecting Quote from: Nicestake on May 06, 2023, 07:00:01 PMAwaiting for it to be get downloaded on my phone ðŸ˜˜I already has , but not good copy as it seems to be a theater cover .

comments.author: mich
comments.body: The saga continues with its legacy, John Wick 4 is open in the box office, and I cannot wait to see it. My friends are saying it has lots of action scenes. I cannot believe that the main characters, John Wick, Keanu Reeves, are still the same since 2014. The man looks the same from John Wick 1 and just does not look like he ages much.Will this killer assassin finally close out the series as we all have waited years for the release. It is a movie for me its worth to pay the admission to the cinemas. I can watch it for free online but want to see it on the big screen with loud stereo audio.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I did watch John Wick 4 and not in the box office. But you are able to watch the movie in its good quality if you still have not watched it. https://radister.monster/movies/play/10366206-john-wick-chapter-4-2023?mid=17&sid=&sec=1aae8ca2bc3928b0218c417a16b3f0281d441f1b&t=1685337790

comments.author: cute nmp
comments.body: One of the best movie I have watched in awhile.John wick movies never disappoint.

comments.author: SFMHodler
comments.body: Nice, I did not even know that they where making another part.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: SFMHodler on May 29, 2023, 09:42:27 PMNice, I did not even know that they where making another part.Lol , do you have no internet ? this has been all over the internet before it goes in the theater and still not know there is a part 4?Â  Quote from: cute nmp on May 29, 2023, 09:34:50 PMOne of the best movie I have watched in awhile.John wick movies never disappoint.still the number 4 part?because I was concern about the last part and that is the topic all about.Quote from: mich on May 29, 2023, 06:12:09 AMWell I did watch John Wick 4 and not in the box office. But you are able to watch the movie in its good quality if you still have not watched it. https://radister.monster/movies/play/10366206-john-wick-chapter-4-2023?mid=17&sid=&sec=1aae8ca2bc3928b0218c417a16b3f0281d441f1b&t=1685337790yeah because for me ? it is overrated and the truth is not as good comparing to part 1-2 .

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: John Wick will make the cowards be actively against guns, even more than they are now.I just hope that young gun people won't think that all the 'odds' absurdities in the movie are real - that they will be protected, somehow, from being killed as a backlash when they use guns.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on December 10, 2023, 04:13:53 PMJohn Wick will make the cowards be actively against guns, even more than they are now.I just hope that young gun people won't think that all the 'odds' absurdities in the movie are real - that they will be protected, somehow, from being killed as a backlash when they use guns.Nothing to argue , I myself is not a Gun lover but have one for House protection , Guns should be use in the time of emergency when we have nothing to run but ourself .Movies must be treated just for fun , and for us to entertain and to never apply in real life.Thanks for all those who watched and posts here , Hope we all enjoyed the movie though it seems to be another part.will be locking for now and lets open when there is another movie part.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: SFMHodler on May 29, 2023, 09:42:27 PMNice, I did not even know that they where making another part.Maybe you are not a Johnwick fan then since this is all over the internet back then and yeah a most awaited one but sadly disappointed with how it ends and how the later part of the movie.Quote from: mich on May 29, 2023, 06:12:09 AMWell I did watch John Wick 4 and not in the box office. But you are able to watch the movie in its good quality if you still have not watched it. https://radister.monster/movies/play/10366206-john-wick-chapter-4-2023?mid=17&sid=&sec=1aae8ca2bc3928b0218c417a16b3f0281d441f1b&t=1685337790Because its overrated but not as best as how the first 3 parts are, so does not go higher in the box office hits.
